# itemProvider

**Instance Property**

The item provider associated with the drag item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var itemProvider: NSItemProvider { get }
```

## Discussion

The item provider conveys the data, or file, that the drag-and-drop activity shares between processes. The property is set when the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDragItem] instance is created. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDragItem/init(itemProvider:)].

## Accessing the drag item’s data

- **localObject**: A custom object associated with the drag item.
